Detailed Description

Database driver.

Abstract class that defines the database drivers. Most of the methods here must be reimplemented by the drivers.

Author:
Oscar van Eijk, Oveas Functionality Provider
Version:
Apr 12, 2011 -- O van Eijk -- initial version

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Conctructor. Is allowed to be empty but must be provided

Reimplemented in MySQL.

$  _server,
$  _name,
$  _user,
$  _password,
$  _multiple = false 
) [abstract]

Make a connection with a database server

Parameters:

[in] $_server Server to connect to
[in] $_name Database name to open
[in] $_user Username to connect with
[in] $_password Password to connect with

Returns:
